se350.elevatorSim.elevator

Interface Elevator

  • All Superinterfaces:
    java.lang.Runnable
    All Known Implementing Classes:
    ElevatorImpl

    public interface Elevator
extends java.lang.Runnable
    An Elevator interface that defines behavior for every elevator implementation. Contains methods for adding destinations, getting remaining destinations, and getting the current floor of the elevator.
    Author:
    Shahzaib Syed

    • Nested Class Summary

      Nested Classes 
      Modifier and Type Interface and Description
      static class  Elevator.Status
      Enum that defines the different states that an Elevator instance can be in depending on it's current action.

    • Method Summary

      Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      void addDestination(int floorNum)
      Adds a destination to the Elevator implementation.
      boolean addPerson(Person p)
      Adds a Person implementation to the elevator.
      int getCurrentFloor()
      Indicates the current floor that the elevator is stopped at or passing.
      java.lang.String getRemainingDestinations()
      Gets information about the pending requests on the Elevator instance.
      Elevator.Status getStatus()
      Gets the Status of an elevator as defined in Elevator.Status

      • Methods inherited from interface java.lang.Runnable

        run

    • Method Detail

      • addDestination

        void addDestination(int floorNum)
                    throws InvalidParameterException
        Adds a destination to the Elevator implementation.
        Parameters:
        floorNum - - the floor the elevator should stop at.
        Throws:
        InvalidParameterException - if the floor is not in the building

      • getCurrentFloor

        int getCurrentFloor()
        Indicates the current floor that the elevator is stopped at or passing.
        Returns:
        The current floor that the elevator is stopped at or passing.

      • addPerson

        boolean addPerson(Person p)
                  throws InvalidParameterException
        Adds a Person implementation to the elevator.
        Parameters:
        p - - The person implementation to add
        Returns:
        true if there is room for the person and they were added, false if no room left and they were not added
        Throws:
        InvalidParameterException

      • getRemainingDestinations

        java.lang.String getRemainingDestinations()
        Gets information about the pending requests on the Elevator instance.
        Returns:
        A string containing the remaining pending requests owned by the Elevator.

      • getStatus

        Elevator.Status getStatus()
        Gets the Status of an elevator as defined in Elevator.Status
        Returns:
        The status of the elevator as defined in Elevator.Status
